oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Interview with Muṣṭafá Ḥusayn al-Ṣāliḥ
مقابلة مع مصطفى حسين الصالح
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Arabic fiction--Palestine
Princes--Fiction
oai_dc:dc.dc:otherSubject: al-Baqqārah (Kurdish tribe); al-Ghannāmah (Kurdish tribe); Arab tribes; Attack; Camels; Children; Conspiracy; Emotions; Generosity; Horses; Hunger; Killing; Knights; Maiden; Marital Abandonment; Marriage; Mothers; Princes; Sheep; Siblings; Slaves; Snakes; Socio-economic conditions; Swords; Uncles; Arab tribes; Brides; Cousins; Engagement; Grooms; Guards; Hospitality; Killing; Knights; Marriage proposals; Prayers; Princes; Siblings; Slaves; Uncles; Water wells; Wedding night; Weddings; Arab tribes; Arbitration; Horses; Killing; She camels; Slaves; Water wells; Wedding celebration
oai_dc:dc.dc:biography: The interview was recorded on December 12, 1995 with Muṣṭafá Ḥusayn al-Ṣāliḥ, male, born in 1934 in Ghuwayr Abū Shūshah, Palestine and resides in ʻAyn al-Ḥilwah Palestinian Refugee Camp, Lebanon.
oai_dc:dc.dc:biographyAR: سجلت المقابلة مع مصطفى حسين الصالح في 12 كانون الأول ديسمبر عام 1995، ذكر، ولد عام 1934 في غوير أبو شوشة، فلسطين ويقيم في مخيم عين الحلوة للاجئين، لبنان.
oai_dc:dc.dc:toc: Story of prince Muhammad al-Jarbah I. (@ 29:38)
oai_dc:dc.dc:tocAR: قصة الأمير محمد الجربة الجزء الأول. (@ 29:38)
oai_dc:dc.dc:toc: Story of prince Muhammad al-Jarbah II. (@ 55:20)
oai_dc:dc.dc:tocAR: قصة الأمير محمد الجربة الجزء الثاني. (@ 55:20)
